original: @134b * // bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po nam mkha'i mdzod la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: @134b * // bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po nam mkha'i mdzod la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the Blessed One, the great compassionate Sky Treasury.üîΩThen,

original: de nas // nam mkha'i mdzod ni brnyes pas te //
analyzed: de nas // nam mkha'i mdzod ni brnyes pas te //
translated: having attained the Sky Treasury,

original: zhes 'byung ba'i sgrub thabs bshad par bya'o //
analyzed: zhes 'byung ba'i sgrub thabs bshad par bya'o //
translated: the means of accomplishment should be explained, as it occurs.

original: sa bcu'i dbang phyug lha dang mi yi gtso //
analyzed: sa bcu'i dbang phyug lha dang mi yi gtso //
translated: Lord of the ten stages, chief of gods and humans,

original: bsod nams ye shes yon tan rgya mtsho yi //
analyzed: bsod nams ye shes yon tan rgya mtsho yi //
translated: ocean of merit and wisdom qualities,

original: mthar phyin gter phyin nam mkha' mdzod brnyes pa //
analyzed: mthar phyin gter phyin nam mkha' mdzod brnyes pa //
translated: having perfected the attainment of the sky treasury,

original: 'jig rten mgon la btud de de bsnyen brjod //
analyzed: 'jig rten mgon la btud de de bsnyen brjod //
translated: bowing to the Lord of the World, I shall recite his praises.

original: sngags 'chang bdag don gzhan don thams cad du //
analyzed: sngags 'chang bdag don gzhan don thams cad du //
translated: In all cases, for the sake of the mantra holder's own and others' goals,

original: me 'obs 'bar ba bsil khang nyams dga' ltar //
analyzed: me 'obs 'bar ba bsil khang nyams dga' ltar //
translated: knowing that a blazing fire pit is like a cool pavilion,

original: shes nas mi chags chags chen rnal 'byor spyod //
analyzed: shes nas mi chags chags chen rnal 'byor spyod //
translated: the greatly attached yogic practitioner does not become attached.

original: mtha' yas nam mkha'i mdzod gter rgyal bas gsungs //
analyzed: mtha' yas nam mkha'i mdzod gter rgyal bas gsungs //
translated: The sky treasury of infinity was taught by the Victorious Ones.

original: phun tshogs tshal lam yang na dbul po'am //
analyzed: phun tshogs tshal lam yang na dbul po'am //
translated: In a perfect grove or also in poverty,

original: yang na dgon dben yid dga'i gnas rnams su //
analyzed: yang na dgon dben yid dga'i gnas rnams su //
translated: or in solitary delightful places,

original: shin tu gos gyon me tog mandal byas //
analyzed: shin tu gos gyon me tog mandal byas //
translated: well-clothed, with flower mandalas,

original: gdung ba spangs pas mgon po dran par bya //
analyzed: gdung ba spangs pas mgon po dran par bya //
translated: By abandoning distress, one should recollect the Lord.üîΩOn a lotus and moon, a precious, excellent vase,

original: padmo zla steng rin chen bum bzang dang // 'dab stong au dum b'a ra'i ge sar rtse //
analyzed: padmo zla steng rin chen bum bzang dang // 'dab stong au dum b'a ra'i ge sar rtse //
translated: and the tip of a thousand-petaled udumbara stamen,

original: mnyam med sa gsum kha lo bsgyur mdzad pa //
analyzed: mnyam med sa gsum kha lo bsgyur mdzad pa //
translated: the unrivaled one who turns the wheel of the three realms,

original: chos rgyas gser mdog 'bar bar bsgom par bya //
analyzed: chos rgyas gser mdog 'bar bar bsgom par bya //
translated: one should meditate on the blazing golden one, the one with vast Dharma.

original: hr'i: las skye pa'i gzhon nu blta na sdug pa yid bzhin gyi shing la sku brten pa //
analyzed: hr'i: las skye pa'i gzhon nu blta na sdug pa yid bzhin gyi shing la sku brten pa //
translated: From the syllable hrƒ´·∏•, one should visualize the youthful, beautiful one, supported on a wish-fulfilling tree,

original: g-yon na padmo 'dzin cing g-yas kyis nor rnams thams cad sbyin par mdzad pa dang / phyogs gcig na 'phags pa nor 'phel rnga yab thogs nas nor gyi rgyun 'bebs pa dang / phyogs gcig na lha mo nor sbyin ma ril ba 'dzin pa nor bu dmar po'i phreng bas brgyan pa ste /
analyzed: g-yon na padmo 'dzin cing g-yas kyis nor rnams thams cad sbyin par mdzad pa dang / phyogs gcig na 'phags pa nor 'phel rnga yab thogs nas nor gyi rgyun 'bebs pa dang / phyogs gcig na lha mo nor sbyin ma ril ba 'dzin pa nor bu dmar po'i phreng bas brgyan pa ste /
translated: holding a lotus in the left hand and granting all wealth with the right hand, and in one direction, noble VasudhƒÅrƒÅ holding a water vessel, raining a stream of wealth, and in one direction, the goddess VasudharƒÅ holding a water vessel, adorned with a garland of red jewels.

original: 'di dag ni btsun pa spyan ras gzigs nam mkha'i mdzod brnyes pa'i bden pa'i byin rlabs kyi rnam par 'phrul pa yin par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: 'di dag ni btsun pa spyan ras gzigs nam mkha'i mdzod brnyes pa'i bden pa'i byin rlabs kyi rnam par 'phrul pa yin par rig par bya'o //
translated: These should be known as the miraculous manifestations of the true blessings of the noble Avalokite≈õvara, who has attained the sky treasury.

original: 'di ni bsgom par bya ba'i gnas //
analyzed: 'di ni bsgom par bya ba'i gnas //
translated: This is the place to be meditated upon.

original: 'gro ba'i gdung ba sel byed pa //üîΩbsod @135a * //
analyzed: 'gro ba'i gdung ba sel byed pa // bsod @135a * //
translated: It removes the distress of beings.

original: nams sprin chen gsal ba'i rgyu //
analyzed: nams sprin chen gsal ba'i rgyu //
translated: It is the cause of the illumination of the great cloud of merit.

original: gsang sngags char chen nor sbyin gzhan //üîΩsnying brtse dga' dang yid gzhungs pas //
analyzed: gsang sngags char chen nor sbyin gzhan // snying brtse dga' dang yid gzhungs pas //
translated: It is the rain of the great cloud of mantra that bestows wealth.

original: don chen byed pa rig sngags che //
analyzed: don chen byed pa rig sngags che //
translated: It is the great knowledge mantra that accomplishes the great purpose with compassion, joy, and intelligence.

original: nam mkha' mtha' yas gzungs dang ni //
analyzed: nam mkha' mtha' yas gzungs dang ni //
translated: It is the dhƒÅra·πáƒ´ of infinite space,

original: sprin chen mdzod kyi rtog pa'o //
analyzed: sprin chen mdzod kyi rtog pa'o //
translated: and the imagination of the great cloud treasury.

original: ji skad bstan pa'i snying po bzhi //
analyzed: ji skad bstan pa'i snying po bzhi //
translated: The four essential points as taught,

original: nus gnyis ldan pa sngon 'gro bas //
analyzed: nus gnyis ldan pa sngon 'gro bas //
translated: endowed with the two abilities, are preceded by

original: 'bum phrag lngar ni bzlas nas su //
analyzed: 'bum phrag lngar ni bzlas nas su //
translated: reciting five hundred thousand times.

original: ci yod lam chen gnas su sbyin //
analyzed: ci yod lam chen gnas su sbyin //
translated: Whatever exists is given to the great path abode.

original: shin tu phan 'dod gdung ba yis //
analyzed: shin tu phan 'dod gdung ba yis //
translated: With the desire to greatly benefit,

original: mgon po la ni mchod pa dang // rang gi 'tsho ba ma gtogs par //
analyzed: mgon po la ni mchod pa dang // rang gi 'tsho ba ma gtogs par //
translated: worship the lord and

original: thams cad yongs su mi gzung ngo //
analyzed: thams cad yongs su mi gzung ngo //
translated: do not hold on to anything at all,üîΩexcept for one's own livelihood.

original: de ltar chog shes gzhan dbang g-yo //
analyzed: de ltar chog shes gzhan dbang g-yo //
translated: Thus, content, dependent, and wavering,

original: som nyi sbangs dang yang med de //
analyzed: som nyi sbangs dang yang med de //
translated: without doubt and hesitation,

original: de ni nyin re sbyin na yang /
analyzed: de ni nyin re sbyin na yang /
translated: if one gives daily,

original: 'byor pas gtugs par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'byor pas gtugs par mi 'gyur ro //

original: thugs rje chen po nam mkha' mdzod kyi sgrub thabs rdzogs so//
